Name: Romantic Shooter
About the game: Romantic Shooter is an erotic shmup game where you'll be able to take control of a fighter planes equipped with different weapons to battle hordes of enemies across multiple levels. 6 Weapons But that's not all! As you progress, you'll be able to unlock new weapons to expand your arsenal: RS001: A fast paced shooting weapon Flame Thrower: Its name talks for itself Stinger: A powerful electric beam Exploder: A space rocket launcher Machine Gun: Tatatatata! Flacker: Very effective in short range combat 60 Upgrades Customize them with over 60 different upgrades! More damage More speed Homing missiles Shields And more... 10 Girls And for the most daring players, there is a special surprise: each level is represented by a different girl and it is possible to rip their clothes as you progress through the game. But beware, this will not be easy and you will have to show skill and dexterity to achieve this goal. Get ready for intense aerial battles, gigantic bosses and a dose of eroticism!
